c. Hildegunde, daughter os the King of the Franks, is at her father’s court.

d. Instead of Hagen, we have here the son of the King of Alemannia who is at the court of Hildegunde‘s father. wyslaus the Handsome, Chief of Wylieia, is in a sense the representative of Hagen, as Gunther’s ally.
